definition: A popular activity involving a spherical object and physical interaction between two teams, typically played on a grassy field. It is commonly enjoyed as a recreational sport and is often watched and celebrated by fans.

examples.english: The soccer game starts at 3 PM.
The soccer game was very exciting.

examples.german: Wir haben das Fußballspiel im Fernsehen gesehen.
examples.english: We watched the soccer game on TV.
